title: Image classification
description: Test an image classification solution with a pre-trained model that can recognize 1000 different types of items from input frames on a mobile camera.

title: Object detection
description: Explore an app using a pre-trained model that draws and labels bounding boxes around 1000 different recognizable objects from input frames on a mobile camera.

title: Pose estimation
description: Explore an app that estimates poses of people in an image.

title: Speech recognition
description: Explore an app that uses a microphone to spot keywords and return a probability score for the words spoken.

title: Gesture recognition
description: Train a neural network to recognize gestures caught on your webcam using TensorFlow.js, then use TensorFlow Lite to convert the model to run inference on your device.

title: Smart reply
description: Generate reply suggestions to input conversational chat messages.

title: Image segmentation
description: Predict whether each pixel of an image is associated with a certain class. Trained with people, places, animals, and more.

title: Style transfer
description: Apply any styles on an input image to create a new artistic image.

title: Digit classifier
description: Use a TensorFlow Lite model to classify your handwritten digits.

title: Text classification
description: Categorize free text into predefined groups. Potential applications include abusive content moderation, tone detection and more.

title: Question and answer
description: Answer user queries based on information extracted from a given text archive.

title: Video classification
description: Identify human actions in video footages.

title: Super resolution
description: Generate a super resolution image from a low resolution image.

title: Optical character recognition
description: Extract texts from images using Optical Character Recognition with TensorFlow Lite.
